summary: An FBI agent's note documenting a September 25, 2020, phone call with attorney John Reynolds, who represents Juan Alessi. The agent inquired about media reports that Alessi made statements on a podcast about Ghislaine Maxwell. Reynolds relayed that Alessi denied giving an interview but confirmed the truth of the story about Maxwell reported in the article.

persons.name: John Reynolds
persons.context: Attorney representing Juan Alessi. He communicated with the FBI agent about media reports concerning his client's alleged statements about Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Juan Alessi
persons.context: Former employee of Jeffrey Epstein. Subject of FBI inquiry regarding alleged statements he made about Ghislaine Maxwell to a podcast, which he denied giving.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual about whom Juan Alessi allegedly made statements. Alessi confirmed via his attorney that a story about her reported in the media was true.

connections.description: John Reynolds is the legal representative for Juan Alessi, as he relayed Alessi's statements to the FBI agent.
Alessi confirmed a story about Ghislaine Maxwell was true, indicating prior knowledge or association.

events.title: FBI Agent Calls Juan Alessi's Attorney
events.description: An FBI agent called attorney John Reynolds to inquire about media reports that his client, Juan Alessi, made statements about Ghislaine Maxwell on a podcast.

events.title: Attorney Relays Client's Denial and Confirmation
events.description: John Reynolds called the FBI agent back after speaking with Juan Alessi. Alessi denied giving a podcast interview but confirmed the truth of a story about Ghislaine Maxwell reported in the media.

keyFacts: Juan Alessi, through his attorney John Reynolds, denied giving an interview to a podcast about Ghislaine Maxwell.
Juan Alessi confirmed that a story about Ghislaine Maxwell reported in a media article was true, but claimed he had never told that story to anyone.
The FBI agent had previously visited Juan Alessi's home with a reporter, which Alessi recalled.
The document is an FBI investigative note (302) dated September 28, 2020, documenting calls from September 25, 2020.
